function.name: Format
function.description: Returns a string containing an expression formatted according to instructions contained in a format expression.

parameter.name: picture
parameter.description: Specifies the format expression, if omitted for Date and DateTime the one set with Utilities.ServerSetUnspecifiedPictureSettings is used.

function.name: iif
function.description: Returns one of two values depending on the value of a logical expression.

parameter.name: truepart
parameter.description: Value or expression returned if expression is True.

parameter.name: falsepart
parameter.description: Value or expression returned if expression is False.

function.name: Empty
function.description: Determines whether an expression evaluates to empty.

function.name: IsNull
function.description: Determines whether an expression evaluates to a null value.

function.name: Strtran
function.description: Searches a character expression or memo field for occurrences of a second character expression or memo field, and then replaces each occurrence with a third character expression or memo field.

parameter.name: src
parameter.description: String expression containing substring to replace.

function.name: Substr
function.description: Returns a character string from the given character expression or memo field.

parameter.name: str
parameter.description: String expression from which characters are returned.

parameter.name: pos
parameter.description: Character position in string at which the part to be taken begins.

function.name: Left
function.description: Returns the specified number of leftmost characters of a character string.

parameter.name: str
parameter.description: String expression from which the leftmost characters are returned.

parameter.name: len
parameter.description: Numeric expression indicating how many characters to return.

function.name: Right
function.description: Returns the specified number of rightmost characters of a character string.

parameter.name: str
parameter.description: String expression from which the rightmost characters are returned.

parameter.name: len
parameter.description: Numeric expression indicating how many characters to return.

function.name: FormatMsg
function.description: Returns a string containing a translated message formatted positioning every parameter in its placeholder.

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: Specifies message with placeholders for every parameter (es: %1)

function.name: Asc
function.description: Returns the ASCII code of the first character of a string.

function.name: At
function.description: Returns the numeric position of the first occurrence of a character string within another character string. Returns 0 if nothing found.

parameter.name: occ
parameter.description: Occurrence from which the srcExpr is searched for in exprSrcd.

function.name: RAt
function.description: Returns the numeric position of the last occurrence of a character string within another character string. Returns 0 if nothing found.

parameter.name: occ
parameter.description: Occurrence from which the srcExpr is searched for in exprSrcd.

function.name: Chr
function.description: Returns a string whose first character corresponds to the ASCII code passed.

function.name: Val
function.description: Returns a numeric value from a character expression composed of numbers.

function.name: Upper
function.description: Converts the specified character expression to uppercase.

function.name: Lower
function.description: Converts the specified character expression to lowercase.

function.name: Trim
function.description: Returns the specified character expression without trailing blanks.

function.name: RTrim
function.description: Returns the specified character expression without trailing blanks.

function.name: LTrim
function.description: Returns the specified character expression without leading blanks.

function.name: LRTrim
function.description: Returns the specified character expression without trailing blanks.

function.name: Replicate
function.description: Returns a character string that contains a specified character expression repeated a specified number of times.

parameter.name: times
parameter.description: Number of times the expression is to be repeated.

function.name: Space
function.description: Returns a string composed of a specified number of spaces.

parameter.name: times
parameter.description: Number of spaces to be repeated.

function.name: Len
function.description: Returns the number of characters of a character expression.

function.name: Str
function.description: Returns a string representation of a number.

parameter.name: len
parameter.description: Number of characters into which the number is converted.

function.name: Mod
function.description: Used to divide two numbers and return only the remainder.

function.name: Min
function.description: Returns the expression with the minimum value.

function.name: Max
function.description: Returns the expression with the maximum value.

function.name: Round
function.description: Rounds a number to the specified decimal digits.

parameter.name: numDec
parameter.description: Number indicating how many places to the right of the decimal are included in the rounding.

function.name: Trunc
function.description: Truncs a number to the specified decimal digits.

parameter.name: numDec
parameter.description: Number indicating how many places to the right of the decimal are included in the truncated number.

function.name: Int
function.description: Truncates decimal digits of a number.

function.name: CharToBool
function.description: Converts a character expression into a logic one.

function.name: BoolToChar
function.description: Converts a logic expression into a character one.

function.name: DateToChar
function.description: Converts a date expression into a character one with pattern YYYYMMDD.

function.name: CharToDate
function.description: Converts a character expression with pattern YYYYMMDD or DD/MM/YYYY into a date one.

function.name: Day
function.description: Returns the day of the specified date.

function.name: Month
function.description: Returns the month of the specified date.

function.name: Year
function.description: Returns the year of the specified date.

function.name: Date
function.description: Returns the current system date or casts a datetime to date.

parameter.name: dateTime
parameter.description: Optional datetime to cast as date.

function.name: DateTime
function.description: Returns the current date and time as a Datetime value (client and server returned values may differ due to timezone settings) or casts a datetime to date.

parameter.name: date
parameter.description: Optional date to cast as datetime.

function.name: Hour
function.description: Returns the hour portion from a Datetime expression.

function.name: Minute
function.description: Returns the minute portion from a Datetime expression.

function.name: Sec
function.description: Returns the second portion from a Datetime expression.

function.name: DayOfWeek
function.description: Returns a numeric day-of-the-week value from a Date expression.

function.name: Week
function.description: Returns a number representing the week of the year from a Date expression.

function.name: DateDiff
function.description: Returns the measure in days of the time interval described by the two parameters.

function.name: AddDays
function.description: Returns a date expression by shifted the number of days specified.

function.name: WRFormatNumber
function.description: Returns a string .

parameter.name: decLen
parameter.description: specifies the number of digits for the decimal part.

parameter.name: decSep
parameter.description: Specifies the character to use as decimal separator.

parameter.name: milSep
parameter.description: Specifies the character to use as thounsands separator.
